translations: n．前陆：沿海地区的陆地，通常指河流、湖泊或海洋的河口附近的地区。
· The forelands along the coast provide a natural barrier against storms.
沿海的前陆地区为抵御风暴提供了天然屏障。

sentences.sentence: The Precambrian metamorphic rocks are developed at the margins of Tarim basin of Xinjiang, among which the Archean metamorphic rocks are distributed in Kuruktag-Xingxingxia area and Altun forelands.
sentences.translation: 新疆塔里木盆地周边发育前寒武纪变质岩系，其太古宙变质岩系分布在库鲁克塔格—星星峡及阿尔金山前。
